name: Enterprise Workflow
description: Automate business processes with A2A agents for expense management, travel booking, and calendar coordination.

agentNotes.a2a-sample-adk-expense-reimbursement: Google ADK agent automating expense submission and approval workflows
agentNotes.a2a-sample-travel-planner-agent: Plans business travel itineraries and manages booking coordination
agentNotes.google-calendar-agent: Go-based agent for scheduling, retrieval, and calendar automation
